trans-unit.source: With the members of the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> namespace, you can programmatically create grammars that comply with the W3C <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Speech Recognition Grammar Specification Version 1.0</see> (SRGS).
trans-unit.target: Con i membri dello spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" />, è possibile creare grammatiche a livello di codice conformi a <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Speech Recognition Grammar Specification versione 1.0</see> (SRGS) di W3C.

trans-unit.source: To create an SRGS grammar programmatically, you construct an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance and add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements.
trans-unit.target: Per creare una grammatica SRGS a livello di codice, si costruisce un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanza e aggiungere istanze di classi che rappresentano elementi SRGS.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> classes represent elements defined in the SRGS specification.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> classi rappresentano gli elementi definiti nella specifica SRGS.

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> class represent attributes in the SRGS specification, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Alcune delle proprietà del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> classe rappresentano gli attributi nella specifica SRGS, ad esempio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>.

trans-unit.source: See [SRGS Grammar XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) for a reference to the elements and attributes of the SRGS specification as supported by System.Speech.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [XML Grammatica SRGS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) per un riferimento a elementi e attributi della specifica supportata da Speech SRGS.

trans-unit.source: To add a grammar rule to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere una regola di grammatica a un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> metodo la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the text within an SRGS element using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> instance.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare il testo all'interno di un elemento SRGS utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> proprietà di un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> istanza.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> class, you can optimize recognition of phrases in a grammar by specifying subsets of a complete phrase that will be allowed to constitute a match, and by selecting a matching mode from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Con il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> (classe), è possibile ottimizzare il riconoscimento delle frasi in una grammatica specificando subset di una frase completa che potrà essere per formare una corrispondenza e selezionare una modalità di corrispondenza dal <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [creare le grammatiche con SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) nel [sistema vocale Guida alla programmazione per .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) per ulteriori informazioni ed esempi.

trans-unit.source: You can also construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instances from existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar files, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile costruire <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanze da file di grammatica SRGS conforme XML esistente, da un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, o da un'istanza di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> class to prepare completed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objects for consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare i metodi del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> classe preparare completato <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> oggetti per l'utilizzo dal motore di riconoscimento vocale.

trans-unit.source: Grammars created with members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace can be used by constructors of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class to create <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Le grammatiche create con i membri del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> dello spazio dei nomi può essere utilizzato da costruttori del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> classe per creare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> oggetti.
